ISSUE.TITLE: Unused variable assignment in `Attachments::create_item()`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Not sure what the original intent was with: ``` $name = basename( $file['file'] ); $name_parts = pathinfo( $name ); $name = trim( substr( $name, 0, -(1 + strlen( $name_parts['extension'] ) ) ) ); ``` Scrutinizer also reports this as unused: ``` $img_url_basename = wp_basename( $data['source_url'] ); ``` Discovered in #2080

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2250 from WP-API/2081-rm-unused-variable Remove unused `$img_url_basename` variable
